summary: As a product manager, my ultimate goal is to ensure that the product is a success by enabling cross-functional teams to succeed. With ~8 years of experience in creating complex B2B SaaS solutions as well as AI-powered B2C features, I focus on understanding and addressing immediate user needs as well as working towards the product vision to realize strategic goals.

highlights: Exploring the use of LLMs, embeddings, cross-encoders and sequence modeling technology in recommendations and working with front-end teams to extract user intent using GenAI to improve matching.
Leading a major organization-wide initiative to unify technology and online platforms across 8 markets and 3 brands in APAC.
Driving cross-brand experiments across six recommendation products, resulting in significant year-over-year uplift in job–candidate matches.
Led the development of a new product line with agile teams in Germany and Nepal, spanning discovery, prototyping, launch, iteration, and support.
Owned the product roadmap and backlogs; contributed to product vision, strategy, and pricing in close collaboration with cross-functional stakeholders.
Successfully launched the company’s new product line and initiated its big data product offering.
Established initiatives for data-driven decision-making in product management.
Drove the shift from a project-based to a product-centric organization, shaping product processes and the growing product team.

roles: Product Management, BI & Marketing Working Student
highlights: One of the first employees, supporting the business across the company website, blog articles and newsletters, graphic design, and customer support.
Gradually transitioned into product and business intelligence responsibilities.
Designed a concept for functionality to optimize pricing based on historical booking data.
experience.notes: [Unverified] Start and end months inferred from CV wording: “between Aug ’14 and Mar ’17.”

details: Thesis on data-driven environmental scanning and foresight.

items.name: Microsoft Office Suite
items.notes: Happy to use Google Workspace, too!

details: Hands-on with web technologies (Angular, Node.js, GraphQL) and Python or Scala for scripting, data work & analysis.
Comfortable with AI tooling such as Replit, Cursor & local model setups for image generation.
Basic knowledge of cloud infrastructure & microservices.

priorities: Enabling the team to do their best
Revisiting past decisions & avoiding repeating mistakes
Prioritizing the truly important & getting it done
